efforts.name: Strategic AI Initiative
efforts.description: Establish comprehensive AI strategy and align organization around AI adoption

projects.name: Strategic Foundation
projects.description: Establish comprehensive AI strategy and vision

tasks.title: ⭐ Executive alignment session
tasks.description: Meet with leadership to align on AI vision and priorities. Ensure buy-in, support, and resource commitment from executives.

tasks.title: Define strategic objectives
tasks.description: Document clear, measurable strategic objectives. Align with business goals, KPIs, and long-term vision. Make objectives specific and time-bound.

tasks.title: Assess current capabilities
tasks.description: Evaluate your team's current AI capabilities. Identify strengths, gaps, and areas for improvement. Assess technical and organizational readiness.

tasks.title: Create comprehensive roadmap
tasks.description: Develop a detailed roadmap with phases, milestones, and success criteria. Include timelines, dependencies, and resource requirements.

tasks.title: Establish governance
tasks.description: Define decision-making processes, roles, and responsibilities for AI initiatives. Create governance structure and approval workflows.

tasks.title: Identify quick wins
tasks.description: Find high-impact, low-effort opportunities to demonstrate value quickly. Build momentum and support for larger initiatives.

projects.name: Team Enablement
projects.description: Enable your team to succeed with AI

tasks.title: ⭐ Communicate strategic vision
tasks.description: Share the AI strategy across the organization. Explain the 'why' and expected outcomes. Ensure everyone understands the direction.

tasks.title: Allocate resources
tasks.description: Assign budget, people, and infrastructure to AI initiatives. Ensure adequate support and remove barriers to success.

tasks.title: Set up success metrics
tasks.description: Define KPIs and measurement frameworks. Track progress regularly and adjust strategy based on results.

tasks.title: Create feedback loops
tasks.description: Establish channels for continuous feedback. Adapt strategy based on learnings and changing conditions.

tasks.title: Build AI capabilities
tasks.description: Invest in training and development. Build AI expertise within the team through courses, workshops, and hands-on practice.

tasks.title: Foster innovation culture
tasks.description: Create environment that encourages experimentation and innovation. Reward learning and calculated risk-taking.

projects.name: Cross-Functional Collaboration
projects.description: Foster collaboration across teams and departments

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify stakeholders
tasks.description: Map all stakeholders affected by AI initiatives. Understand their needs, concerns, and how they'll be impacted.

tasks.title: Facilitate cross-team meetings
tasks.description: Organize regular meetings between teams. Share progress, align on priorities, and resolve conflicts.

tasks.title: Create shared goals
tasks.description: Establish shared goals that require cross-team collaboration. Align incentives and create win-win scenarios.

tasks.title: Build communication channels
tasks.description: Set up communication channels for cross-team collaboration. Use tools and processes that facilitate information sharing.

tasks.title: Resolve conflicts proactively
tasks.description: Address conflicts and misalignments early. Facilitate discussions and find solutions that work for all parties.

tasks.title: Celebrate collaborative wins
tasks.description: Recognize and celebrate successes that result from collaboration. Reinforce value of working together.

efforts.name: Resource & Risk Management
efforts.description: Manage resources effectively and mitigate risks

tasks.title: ⭐ Create resource plan
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive resource plan covering budget, people, infrastructure, and time. Align with strategic objectives.

tasks.title: Allocate budget strategically
tasks.description: Distribute budget across initiatives based on priority and ROI. Balance short-term wins with long-term investments.

tasks.title: Plan team capacity
tasks.description: Assess team capacity and plan allocation. Balance current work with new AI initiatives and training needs.

tasks.title: Manage infrastructure costs
tasks.description: Plan infrastructure spending. Optimize for cost while ensuring performance and scalability.

tasks.title: Track resource utilization
tasks.description: Monitor how resources are being used. Identify inefficiencies and reallocate as needed.

tasks.title: Adjust resource allocation
tasks.description: Regularly review and adjust resource allocation based on progress and changing priorities.

tasks.title: ⭐ Conduct risk assessment
tasks.description: Identify potential risks: technical, organizational, financial, and compliance. Assess likelihood and impact.

tasks.title: Create risk mitigation plans
tasks.description: Develop plans to mitigate identified risks. Assign owners and set timelines for risk reduction activities.

tasks.title: Establish risk monitoring
tasks.description: Set up processes to monitor risks continuously. Track risk indicators and trigger mitigation when thresholds are crossed.

tasks.title: Plan for contingencies
tasks.description: Develop contingency plans for high-impact risks. Prepare for scenarios where things don't go as planned.

tasks.title: Create incident response plan
tasks.description: Document procedures for responding to incidents. Define escalation paths and communication plans.

tasks.title: Review and update risk plans
tasks.description: Regularly review risk register and mitigation plans. Update as conditions change and new risks emerge.
